  • Classes in com.amazonaws.athena.connectors.jdbc.connection used by com.amazonaws.athena.connectors.clickhouse 
    Class Description
    DatabaseConnectionConfig
    Encapsulates database JDBC connection configuration.
    JdbcConnectionFactory
    Factory abstracts creation of JDBC connection to database.
  • Classes in com.amazonaws.athena.connectors.jdbc.connection used by com.amazonaws.athena.connectors.cloudera 
    Class Description
    DatabaseConnectionConfig
    Encapsulates database JDBC connection configuration.
    DatabaseConnectionInfo
    Encapsulates database and JDBC driver defaults for a database type.
    GenericJdbcConnectionFactory
    Provides a generic jdbc connection factory that can be used to connect to standard databases.
    JdbcConnectionFactory
    Factory abstracts creation of JDBC connection to database.
